name: Capricorn
description: Capricorn is an automated market maker (AMM) based decentralized exchange (DEX) for CUBE Blockchain. Capricorn dedicates to building a robust, efficient, and highly-liquid market with governance token CORN. Capricorn will provide frictionless and efficient trading experiences, benefiting from Ivy Blocks' millions of USD liquidity investments. Meanwhile, Capricorn will offer sustainable returns to users and stakeholders.
